title: Ticket #7012: Errno 75 can occur when moving large files in FileTransfer mechanism
description: According to a report from a CHTC user, it seems that when using a 32 bit shadow it is possible to get errno 75 (Value too large for defined data type) when attempting to move a file larger than a 32-bit size during file transfer. This should be confirmed as a bug and then fixed in stable.
remarks:
2020-Apr-10 07:42:27 by tim:
Bulk change of target version from v080808 to v080809 using ticket-target-mover.
creator: zmiller
